short_summary: Risk management consultation service, Process and procedures management consultation service, Project impact assessment
description: The Financial Consumer Agency of Canada (FCAC) requirement is for the provision of the following professional services: Information/Records Management/Recordkeeping Specialist consultant. The proposed period of contract shall be from date of contract to 2024-03-31 (firm requirement) plus up to four (4) one (1) year option periods.
full_summary:
Here is the rewritten entry.

**Tender Announcement: Information/Records Management/Recordkeeping Specialist - Senior Level**

**Reference Number:** # 20230680

**Notice Type:** RFP Against Supply Arrangement

**Solicitation Number:** 20230680

**Publication Date:** June 23, 2023

**Closing Date:**  July 12, 2023 (2:00 PM EST)

**Expected Contract Start Date:** September 1, 2023

**Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

**NCT Fredericton Lot Title:** Risk Management \& Process/Procedure Management

**Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Trade Agreements:**

* Canada–Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada–Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada–Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada–Korea Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada–Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Procurement Category:** 
Service Procurement

**Task Details:**
This requirement is for the provision of professional services as an Information/Records Management/Recordkeeping Specialist. The estimated level of effort will be 60 days per fiscal year. The consultant must be able to provide information/records management services and support activities including but not limited to data entry, filing, data cleaning, and data quality assurance.

**Requirements:**
Company Minimum Security Level Required is Secret, Resource Minimum Security Level Required is Secret.

**Associated Documents:**
Notice of proposed procurement (NPP), Proposed period of contract, Estimated Level of Effort.

**Contact Information:**

* Stephane Dupel, Contract Authority,
	+ Email: [stephane.dupel@fcac-acfc.gc.ca](mailto:stephane.dupel@fcac-acfc.gc.ca)
	+ Phone: (613) 371-3223
* Government of Canada Contact:
